name: Clara Sun Woo Teal Faux Wrap Dress
description: Lovely Dress with faux wrap styling and a little twist at the waist just to keep things interesting. Soft poly-rayon travel knit.

name: Pretty Angel Winged Sweater
description:
Beautiful winged sweater with embellished studded accents. Available in Teal and Sandstone Blends. 42% Linen, 38% Polyester, and 20% Cotton. 

All seasons sweater can be worn with a tank top in the summer months or with a long sleeve top underneath in colder months.

name: Clara Sun Woo print shark bite
description:
The favorite style in Clara's exclusive holiday print.
Black background loaded with fireworks of red, green and royal blue.
Soft travel-friendly poly rayon just drapes your body without being too clingy.

name: It Takes Courage Cuff Bracelet
description:
"It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are" Cummings. Brass/bronze Large Sentiment with Wide Cuff in two colors, Drk. Chestnut or Black. 

The bracelet above (shown with this cuff is sold out.)

name: Love Never Fails Wide Cuff
description: Beautiful Cuff Bracelet with "Love Never Fails" sentiment. Corinthians...in silver. Wide Cuff in Dark Chestunut , or  Black.

These plates are interchangeable.

name: Vintage Inspired Classic Hat/Feathers
description: This Beauty is a great addition to all you hat lovers. It is beautiful with feathers. 70% polyester and 30% Wool.

name: Swallow Necklace
description: A Victorian swallow soars on a ring of crystals surrounding an enamel blue sky. Pendant is 1.5" in diameter. Burnished bronze and silver metal finish. Lobster claw clasp. Signed and copyrighted Sweet Romance USA.

name: Plaid Hat
description:
Adorable Plaid Hat to keep you warm.

100% Polyester

name: Ruffled Denim Blue Dress
description:
Beautiful Ruffled Denim Blue long sleeved dress. It is one of our most flattering comfortable dress we have in our boutique. We suggest a pair of leggings and boots for that perfect look. 
95% Vicose
5% Lycra 

Thermal Leggings and the beautiful handmade necklace are available.

name: Ruffled Dress Ombre
description:
Ruffled Dress in Dark grey, to light grey to black. This dress is very flattering in all sizes. Great addition to your wardrobe. We suggest adding leggins and boots. 

Leggings available.

name: Sue Woo Handmade Original Necklace
description:
Beautiful hand beaded necklace by artist Sue Woo. Leland Blue Stone on vintage lace and denim with brass chain. 

One of a Kind!

name: Chalet Tank Top
description:
A beautiful layering piece or wear it alone. This collection is versatile. You can wear it all year round. In the summer you can wear it with a layering tank top and in the winter add a long sleeve shirt and a sweater. Great with leggings and boot. Leggings available too. 

50% polyester
38% cotton
12% rayon

name: Ava Hat
description: Soft wool cloche with bronze studded accented flower trim

name: Women Scoop Neck Raglan Long Sleeve With Pouch
description: The perfect in-between and all season top. This is a great layering piece and super soft.

description:
Open filigree and enameled flowers wrap around a jade agate.
Lobster claw clasp. Burnished bronze metal finish.

description:
THE ONE AND ONLY

name: Double Bloom Hat
description: Great Soft Hat with Reinforced Brim. Wool Blend, but so soft.

name: Crystal Cushion Bracelet
description: A beautiful bracelet in two different colors to choose from. Burnished bronze or silver metal finish. Fold-over clasp. Signed and copyrighted Sweet Romance USA.

name: French Trellis Necklace
description: Necklace features a garden trellis adorned with miniature elements--birds, flowers and butterflies--and freshwater pearls. Lobster claw clasp. Mixed metal finishes of burnished bronze and silver. Signed and copyrighted Sweet Romance USA

name: Junior Snow Jersey Long Sleeve Zip Hoodie with Pouch, Silicon Wash
description: Keep warm and fashionable in Kavio!'s long sleeve zip hoodie with pouch. You can't go wrong with this classic piece- A perfect addition to every girl's wardrobe! Also, it's made of snow jersey, providing superior comfort.

name: Junior Raw Edge Pant Oxidize Wash
description: Our oxy wash pant has great style and so comfortable you'll want to wear them everywhere.

name: Junior Retro Wash BurnOut Jersey Long Sleeve Zip Hoodie
description: Take a break or add some flair to your daily wardrobe with our retro wash burnout hoodie. This vintage inspired top features front zip up and pockets for added style and a unique wash for an ultra soft touch. Great as a layering piece or on its own, this hooded sweater is a must-have of the season.

name: Darcy Cloche
description: Two tone cloche wool felt hat with grosgrain ribbon bow trim. Beautiful!

name: Believe Small Sentiment
description:
Lenny & Eva Jewelry Sentiment BELIEVE
This Lenny & Eva Jewelry Sentiment features the word BELIEVE in capital letters. Small sentiments offer a word of encouragement, inspiration or motivation. Lead-free and available in weathered brass or antique silver finish, small sentiments can be worn with just about any Lenny & Eva Jewelry piece.... add your favorite charms to complete your look.

    Lenny & Eva Jewelry designed to be interchangeable and collected
    Small sentiments measure 1 7/8" long and x 3/4" tall
    Handcrafted in the United States
THIS PIECE IS DESIGNED TO ATTACH TO THIN CUFF BRACELET

name: Large Cuff Bracelet
description:
The Lenny & Eva wide leather cuff is one of the most versatile jewelry pieces in this unique vintage inspired line. The wide leather cuff is designed with four brass clasps that allows you to attach and change a large sentiment, small sentiment, bird charm or Mojo pendant... then add your favorite Lenny & Eva charms to complete your look. Made from the highest quality leathers, the wide leather cuffs are super soft and available in an assortment of fashion and neutral colors. Whatever type of inspiration your day needs, look no further than your wrist...

    Wide leather cuffs are made from the highest quality leathers in assorted colors
    Wide leather cuff bracelets measure 8.25" long and 1.625" wide
    Cuff bracelet has buttonhole closure and adjusts to fit wrists 5.5" to 8"
    Handcrafted in the United States

name: Large Sentiment Keep Calm and Carry on
description:
Lenny & Eva Jewelry - Keep Calm and Carry on Large Sentiment
This Lenny and Eva Large Sentiment features the bible verse "Do not be afraid. Just believe." from Luke 8:50.

The Lenny & Eva large sentiment plates feature quotes and sayings of encouragement, inspiration and motivation. Like all Lenny & Eva jewelry accessory pieces, the large sentiments are to be collected and interchanged as often as your mood or feelings.

name: Large Cuff Sentiment Not all Who Wander are Lost
description:
Lenny & Eva Jewelry - Not all who wander are lost, Tolkien


The Lenny & Eva large sentiment plates feature quotes and sayings of encouragement, inspiration and motivation. Like all Lenny & Eva jewelry accessory pieces, the large sentiments are to be collected and interchanged as often as your mood or feelings.

The Lenny & Eva large sentiment plates feature quotes and sayings of encouragement, inspiration and motivation. Like all Lenny & Eva jewelry accessory pieces, the large sentiments are to be collected and interchanged as often as your mood or feelings. 
To be worn with the large cuff.

description:

Made from the highest quality leathers, the thin leather cuffs are super soft and available in an assortment of fashion and neutral colors. Lenny & Eva Jewelry looks great layered so the more the better! Whatever type of inspiration your day needs, look no further than your wrist

    Cuff bracelet has buttonhole closure and adjusts to fit wrists 6" to 8"

name: Clara Sun Woo Shark Bite Basic TunicT68
description:
Bee-u-ti-ful basic tunic in rich solid colors.
Clara's soft travel knit in poly spandex.
Pair it with her palazzo pants or......
If you've got great legs, go for the leggings-and-boots look...
Note: Can be worn either as v-neck or round neck!

(Call us at 815-776-1037 for additional Prints and Colors we have in stock!) Selection is selling out quickly!

name: Ethyl's Awesome Skinny Pant
description:
Best Seller!
Ethyl's Awesome pull-on style Skinny Stretch Bengalene Fabric.
Perfect 3 season weight. Features detail seam down the
center front of each pant leg.
Very important to go down a size, ladies.

name: Parkhurst Boiled Wool Hat
description: Charcoal Cloche with Denim Blue and Fine Wine Flowers in high quality boiled wool

name: Euro Awesome Straight leg Pant
description:
OK ladies. If you come to Galena to buy yourself more of these Awesome pants, come straight to Carlotta's. They are roomy, comfortable, stretchy and run a size up. Not a low rise by any means, they hit right at the natural waist. Average length for 5'5" and up. We can't stress enough that you GO DOWN A SIZE.
Poly Rayon Spandex Bengaline.

name: Mod Hoody
description:
This adorable cowl neck dress has unlimited possibilities. The ultra soft bamboo French terry fabric feels wonderfully soft and supple.

Reversed serge seam at the hip line adds a touch of fun detail. The long sleeves and bottom are all surged raw edge hems. The ultra long cowl neck can be draped over the shoulders, worn as a cowl neck, or as a hooded dress.

Fabric: 66% bamboo / 28% organic cotton / 6% spandex french terry

name: Clara Sun Woo Cold Shoulder Shark Bite Tunic
description:
Amazing soft knit tunic.
Vivacious, simple, ageless dressing. 
Pair it with the Clara S leggings, palazzo pants, or straight skirt.
(We suggest going down a size on this one)
Clara Sun Woo uses the finest easy-care fabrics.
Her soft knit is poly rayon spandex.
Wash it and wear it.
(Call us at 815-776-1037 for availability of other colors!)

name: Clara Sun Woo Palazzo Pant
description: Soft knit  with wide comfort waistband.

name: Clara Sun Woo LGPT Legging
description: Clara S Black soft knit Legging. Fantastic Missy fit in easy-care poly-rayon knit. Elastic waist. Full Length.

name: Clara Sun Woo Sparkle Dress
description: SERIOUS sparkle....a shimmery knit little black dress. Drape neckline, with cap sleeves and side ruching. A beautiful style for any figure.

name: Clara S T23 Scoop Neck Tunic
description:
Soft knit must-have Basic Top . 
Perfect fit tunic has a slight a-line fit that just skims the hips.
Set-in long sleeves. Careful scoop neck to show off your favorite accessory.
Poly-rayon spandex fabric.

name: Kavio Retro Burnout
description: Perfected to layer or worn alone, this retro inspired top is our favorite must-have of the season. It features a classic v neckline for a relaxed fit and a unique wash offering an ultra soft touch for a worn-in vintage look. Contemporary fit.....

name: Seafoam and Beads Ring
description:
Ring features a large glass muted seafoam matrix oval stone surrounded by tiny mottled glass beads.
    A wide comfortable pierce work band is open at the back; adjustable for sizes 6-9.
    Metal finish is burnished silver.
    Signed and copyrighted Ollipop, a division of Sweet Romance USA.

name: Coral and Turquoise Ring
description:
Blue dyed howlite cabochon is surrounded by tiny coral beads and an elipse of midnight blue crystal stones.
    A wide comfortable pierce work band is open at the back; adjustable for sizes 6-9.
    Metal finish is burnished bronze.
    Signed and copyrighted Ollipop, a division of Sweet Romance USA.

name: Vintage Elements Necklace
description:
A charming necklace with many vintage elements.
    Natural stones of cabochon cut Amazonite and crystal cut Aragonite.
    Circa 1930 vintage jadeite drops.
    The coin pearl has a slight iridescent luster.
    Elements are encircled by seed pearls and hang on a Figaro chain.
    Metal finish is bronze.
    Signed Ollipop, a division of Sweet Romance.

name: Green Jadeite and Blue Ring
description:
Blue glass beads, hematite crystals and seed pearls surround a green jadeite oval stone.
A wide comfortable pierce work band is open at the back; adjustable for sizes 6-9.
Burnished bronze metal finish.
Signed and copyrighted Ollipop, a division of Sweet Romance USA

name: Ivorina Floral Oval Earrings
description:
The oval floral is created from the mold of a "Peking" glass ornament that was originally mounted in a circa 1921 boudoir lamp.
    Colored for the look of stained ivory, it's mounted on a bezel with the border design, or "tracery" enameled in black.
    Lever back style for pierced ears.
    Warm bronze metal finish.
    Trademark Sweet Romance USA.

name: Ivorina Floral Necklace
description:
The oval floral is created from the mold of a "Peking" glass ornament that was originally mounted in a circa 1921 boudoir lamp.
    Colored for the look of stained ivory, it's mounted on a bezel with the border design, or "tracery" enameled in black.
    Warm bronze metal finish. Lobster claw clasp.
    Signed and copyrighted Sweet Romance USA

name: Gemstone Beads and Flowers Bracelet
description:
Chrysocola, magnesite, apple green jade, yellow jasper and howlite beads are blended with floral details to create this earthy, natural composition.
    A little enamel turtle is perched atop the fold-over clasp.
    Fold-over clasp.
    Metal finish is burnished bronze.
    Signed and copyrighted Ollipop, a division of Sweet Romance USA.

name: Ivorina Floral Oval Cuff Bracelet
description:
The oval floral is created from the mold of a "Peking" glass ornament that was originally mounted in a circa 1921 boudoir lamp.
    Colored for the look of stained ivory, it's mounted on a bezel with the border design, or "tracery" enameled in black.
    The contrast of the black lacquered filigree side panels and hammered bronze cuff make for a an elegant retro look.
    Tapered cuff can be formed to your wrist - adjustable for 6" to 8" wrists.
    Warm bronze metal finish.
    Trademark Sweet Romance USA

name: Vintage Coral Cuff Bracelet
description:
Vintage style cuff bracelet features coral floral carving bordered by seed pearls.
    Tapered cuff has a hammered texture and fits wrists 6" - 8."
    Metal finish is burnished bronze.
    Signed and copyrighted Ollipop, a division of Sweet Romance USA.

name: Shabby Chic Rose Ring
description:
Cream enamel heirloom rose is surrounded by tiny seed pearls on a round setting.
    French silver finish method imparts a pale, antiquarian glow, convincing the eye of a treasure from decades past.
    A wide comfortable pierce work band is open at the back; adjustable for sizes 6-9.
    Burnished silver metal finish.
    Signed and copyrighted Ollipop, a division of Sweet Romance USA.

name: Green Gemstone Flower Bracelet
description:
Bracelet features three gemstone flower links with faceted glass stone centers.
    Adjustable toggle closure.
    Metal finish is burnished bronze.
    Signed and copyrighted Ollipop, a division of Sweet Romance USA.

name: Women Sheer Jersey Two-Fer Contrast Burnout Long Sleeve
description: This lightweight two-fer inspired style features contrasting fabrics. The body is an ultra soft cotton-poly sheer jersey and the sleeves a burnout fabric. It comes pre-shrunk with a silicon wash for added softness.

name: Tangerine Flower Necklace
description:
Exuberant enamel blossoms, glazed terra cotta and forged filigrees awaken memories of romantic mid-century Mexico. Feel the passion, the rapturous color and joy in jewelry pieces that let your spirit return to that life.

    Lobster claw clasp.
    Burnished bronze metal finish.
    Signed and copyrighted Ollipop, a division of Sweet Romance USA.

name: Gemstone Cuff Medallion
description:
The medallion on this cuff is a multi-level construction begins with a bronze finished flat braid followed by a silver scalloped circle.
    A starburst pierced filigree is positioned over genuine aragonite.
    Center stone is checkerboard faceted jade.
    Tapered cuff has a hammered texture and fits wrists 6" - 8."
    Metal finish is burnished bronze.
    Signed and copyrighted Ollipop, a division of Sweet Romance USA.

name: Rainbow Jewel Necklace
description:
An oversized round aurora crystal jewel is the centerpiece of this 1940s style pendant necklace.
    Its dazzle is calmed by its mounting, an open back setting struck from old tooling originally made 70 years ago.
    A round mesh chain equalizes the visual weight and presence of the pendant.
    Pendant hangs 1-5/8" from chain
    Burnished bronze metal finish.
    Copyright Sweet Romance USA

name: Retromex Flower Earrings
description:
In this simple, yet distinctive composition, a bronze Mexican daisy is mounted on a pierced silver finished disk.
    It dangles from an oval cut amazonite stone in a rope setting. All elements are hand fabricated.
    Inspired by jewelry of the 1930s. During WWII, when European luxury goods weren’t obtainable, American stores turned to Mexico to import native, hand wrought jewelry which defined the beginning of an entire industry.
    Mixed metals of burnished bronze and silver. Lever-back style for pierced ears only.
    Signed and copyright Ollipop, a division of Sweet Romance USA

name: Glass Beads Flutter Earrings
description:
Varying shaped luminous glass beads in a palette of summer golds, vibrant turquoise, muted green mint and wine rose.
    Lever back style for pierced ears only.
    Metal finish is burnished bronze.
    Signed and copyrighted Ollipop, a division of Sweet Romance USA.

name: Turquoise and Filigree Southwest Earrings
description:
A ring of turquoise enamel drops surround a retro filigree.
    Lever back for pierced ears only.
    Metal finish is burnished bronze.
    Signed and copyrighted Ollipop, a division of Sweet Romance USA.

name: Beautiful Subtle Rose Earrings
description:
Soft pink enamel rose with pearl center rests atop an heirloom pinwheel.
    Simple ‘hook’ earwire for pierced ears only.
    Metal finish is burnished silver.
    Signed and copyrighted Ollipop, a division of Sweet Romance USA.

name: Green, Pearl Filigree Earrings
description:
Chrysocola, magnesite, apple green jade, yellow jasper and howlite beads are blended with floral details to create this earthy, natural composition.
    A little enamel turtle is perched atop the fold-over clasp.
    Fold-over clasp.
    Metal finish is burnished bronze.
    Signed and copyrighted Ollipop, a division of Sweet Romance USA.

name: Retro Daisy Cuff Bracelet
description:
Retro daisy is enameled in blue-green and has a coral crystal center.
    Tapered cuff has a hammered texture and fits wrists 6" - 8."
    Metal finish is burnished bronze.
    Signed and copyrighted Ollipop, a division of Sweet Romance USA.

name: Cross Necklace
description:
Even before the arrival of Christianity in the Yucatan, the Maya revered the symbol of the cross as their Tree of Life. As the two cultures converged in the 1500s, the Maya retained traditions from their own understanding of the cosmos. Yet, they embraced the cross as a medium through which a person could awaken their spirit, invoke blessings and receive divine inspiration. It has been centuries, but remarkably, almost miraculously, the Maya continue to dwell in the Yucatan and Guatemala. The sculptural, polychrome facades of their ancient buildings and their color-drenched weaving continue to infuse daily life with a sense of the spiritual. My cross design is born of that world. Colors of the earth are expressed in stunning metalwork and crystal beads, each made by hand in the lampwork process. Many artists have put their hands to the creation of your necklace or cuff. May it bring you joy and inspiration.

    Drapes 3.5"
    Burnished bronze metal finish.
    Lobster claw clasp.
    Signed and copyrighted Ollipop, a division of Sweet Romance USA.

name: Peacock Ring
description:
A graceful peacock is standing in a marsh of blue enamel and flowers set with smoked crystal.
    Shank is a comfortable wide pierced band, adjustable for sizes 6 to 9.
    Burnished silver metal finish.
    Signed and copyrighted Ollipop, a division of Sweet Romance USA.

name: Dragonfly Garden Ring
description:
A scene from my neighbor’s garden is rendered in my ring design.
    The ring is created with dimensional elements, including flowers set with crystal and a dragonfly with beaded wings.
    The subtle green-lavender palette on mixed silver and bronze offers the notion of a mini paradise in our midst that we seldom even notice.
    Comfortable band shank adjusts to fit sizes 6 - 9.
    Signed and copyrighted Ollipop, a division of Sweet Romance USA.

Background story: The symbolism of a dragonfly changes with each culture. The main symbolisms of the dragonfly are renewal, positive force and the power of life in general. Dragonflies can also be a symbol of the sense of self that comes with maturity. Also, as a creature of the wind, the dragonfly frequently represents change. And as a dragonfly lives a short life, it knows it must live its life to the fullest with the short time it has. Live like a dragonfly!

name: Mermaid Ring
description:
Mythical Goddess of the Sea at your fingertips.  Adjustable Mermaid Ring. Ollipop.
Sculptured in bronze, my little mermaid floats within a frame of vintage starlight crystal.
Curls of water, ending in lustrous aurora stones surround her while a sea leaf is wrapped around the frame below.
Shank is a comfortable wide pierced band, adjustable for sizes 6 to 9.
Burnished bronze metal finish.
Signed and copyrighted Ollipop, a division of Sweet Romance USA.

name: Penelope Top Malachite Green
description: This adorable tunic length top has a flattering square neckline and a diagonal reversed seam front yoke accent. The elasticized shoulder rouching and surged raw edge hem adds a touch of fun and femininity to this wonderful top. Made of hemp / organic cotton jersey, this is a durable piece that looks great with jeans or a skirt.

name: Dharma Pants-Earth's Creations
description:
Our classic wide legged crop yoga pant has a great comfortable fit and feel.  The feminine lettuce edge on the leg bottoms add a touch of fun and class.

abric: 55% hemp / 45% organic cotton jersey
Made in the U.S.A
